textboxes.description: As Em drives along a dusty road, she spots Lady Margaret Thatcher, impeccably dressed and holding her handbag, standing by the remains of her royal convoy. A swarm of giant insects buzzes ominously in the distance.

Lady Margaret steps gracefully into the camper, nodding in approval. 'A shame about the convoy,' she remarks coolly, 'but I suppose this old road will do.' The buzzing from the giant insects grows louder.

choices.text: Speed up to escape the insects

skill_check.fail: Em struggles with the wheel as the swarm gains on them.

choices.text: Try to lose the insects in a nearby forest

skill_check.fail: Em takes a wrong turn, driving deeper into the insect-infested territory.

textboxes.description: Em decides to keep driving, ignoring the scene. But as she checks her rearview mirror, she catches a glimpse of the swarm overwhelming the convoy remains, leaving her uneasy.
With a steady hand on the wheel, Em manages to outpace the swarm, leaving the buzzing far behind. Lady Margaret nods approvingly, 'Excellent maneuvering, dear.'

choices.text: Continue driving towards a safer location

textboxes.description: Em navigates through the winding forest, dodging branches and potholes. Despite a close call with a tree, she manages to throw off the swarm. Lady Margaret gives her a rare smile.

choices.text: Find a spot to rest and regroup

textboxes.description: Em pulls over in a clearing. Lady Margaret, visibly relieved, adjusts her attire, thanking Em with a firm handshake. 'It appears, dear Em, that I owe you a great debt.'

choices.text: Accept her gratitude and part ways
Ask Lady Margaret if she requires any further assistance

skill_check.fail: Lady Margaret shakes her head politely, preferring to handle matters alone.

textboxes.description: Em and Lady Margaret part ways on good terms, each acknowledging the other's resourcefulness.
Lady Margaret considers Em's offer and nods. 'Indeed, perhaps you might accompany me to a nearby safe house.' Together, they continue down the road, sharing stories of past adventures.
